name: Simulate template matches overlapping legacy and composable templates

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-8.19.0-8e8f4b0d0356e0831cca1899a7e8a7139653db39 "index template [winning_v2_template] has index patterns [test*] matching patterns from existing older templates [v1_template] with patterns (v1_template => [test*, t1*]); this template [winning_v2_template] will take precedence during new index creation"
